query.sfwSql: SELECT distinct BPM_CASE.* FROM (SELECT sgw_bpm_case.CASE_ID, sgw_bpm_case.CASE_FILE, sgw_bpm_case.NAME, sgw_bpm_case.DESCRIPTION, sgw_bpm_case.VERSION, sgw_bpm_case.STATUS_VALUE, sgw_bpm_case.STATUS_ID, sgw_bpm_case.RESOURCE_ID, sgw_bpm_case.EFFECTIVE_DATE, CASE WHEN ACTIVE_BPM_CASE.CASE_ID IS NULL THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END AS CURRENT_VERSION FROM sgw_bpm_case WITH(NOLOCK) left join (SELECT * FROM (SELECT case_id, CASE WHEN (ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY name ORDER BY case_id desc )) = 1 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS ACTIVE_VERSION FROM sgw_bpm_case WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE EFFECTIVE_DATE < = GETDATE()) AS C WHERE ACTIVE_VERSION = 'Y') AS ACTIVE_BPM_CASE ON sgw_bpm_case.CASE_ID = ACTIVE_BPM_CASE.CASE_ID)AS BPM_CASE LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT distinct d.resource_id, a.USER_ID FROM sgs_user a WITH(NOLOCK) , sgs_user_roles b WITH(NOLOCK) , sgs_resources d WITH(NOLOCK) , sgs_security e WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE a.user_serial_id = b.user_serial_id AND b.role_id = e.role_id AND e.resource_id = d.resource_id AND ((b.effective_start_DATE is null) or (b.effective_start_date < = convert(dateTime, convert(char, getdate(), 103), 103))) AND ((b.effective_end_DATE is null) or (b.effective_end_date > = convert(dateTime, convert(char, getdate(), 103), 103))) AND d.RESOURCE_TYPE_VALUE = 'BPM') RES ON RES.RESOURCE_ID = BPM_CASE.RESOURCE_ID where CASE_ID > 0 ORDER BY CASE_FILE, CASE_ID desc
query.sfwOracle: SELECT distinct BPM_CASE.* FROM (SELECT sgw_bpm_case.CASE_ID, sgw_bpm_case.CASE_FILE, sgw_bpm_case.NAME, sgw_bpm_case.DESCRIPTION, sgw_bpm_case.VERSION, sgw_bpm_case.STATUS_VALUE, sgw_bpm_case.STATUS_ID, sgw_bpm_case.RESOURCE_ID, sgw_bpm_case.EFFECTIVE_DATE, CASE WHEN ACTIVE_BPM_CASE.CASE_ID IS NULL THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END AS CURRENT_VERSION FROM sgw_bpm_case left join (SELECT * FROM (SELECT case_id, CASE WHEN (ROW_NUMBER() OVER ( PARTITION BY name ORDER BY case_id desc )) = 1 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS ACTIVE_VERSION FROM sgw_bpm_case WHERE EFFECTIVE_DATE < = UDF_GET_SYSTEM_DATE('Y')) C WHERE ACTIVE_VERSION = 'Y') ACTIVE_BPM_CASE ON sgw_bpm_case.CASE_ID = ACTIVE_BPM_CASE.CASE_ID) BPM_CASE LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT distinct d.resource_id, a.USER_ID FROM sgs_user a , sgs_user_roles b , sgs_resources d , sgs_security e WHERE a.user_serial_id = b.user_serial_id AND b.role_id = e.role_id AND e.resource_id = d.resource_id AND ((b.effective_start_DATE is null) or (b.effective_start_date < = UDF_GET_SYSTEM_DATE('Y'))) AND ((b.effective_end_DATE is null) or (b.effective_end_date > = UDF_GET_SYSTEM_DATE('Y'))) AND d.RESOURCE_TYPE_VALUE = 'BPM') RES ON RES.RESOURCE_ID = BPM_CASE.RESOURCE_ID where case_id >0 ORDER BY CASE_FILE, CASE_ID desc
query.sfwPostgre: SELECT distinct BPM_CASE.* FROM (SELECT sgw_bpm_case.CASE_ID, sgw_bpm_case.CASE_FILE, sgw_bpm_case.NAME, sgw_bpm_case.DESCRIPTION, sgw_bpm_case.VERSION, sgw_bpm_case.STATUS_VALUE, sgw_bpm_case.STATUS_ID, sgw_bpm_case.RESOURCE_ID, sgw_bpm_case.EFFECTIVE_DATE, CASE WHEN ACTIVE_BPM_CASE.CASE_ID IS NULL THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END AS CURRENT_VERSION FROM sgw_bpm_case left join (SELECT * FROM (SELECT case_id, CASE WHEN (ROW_NUMBER() OVER ( PARTITION BY name ORDER BY case_id desc )) = 1 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS ACTIVE_VERSION FROM sgw_bpm_case WHERE EFFECTIVE_DATE <= UDF_GET_SYSTEM_DATE('Y')) C WHERE ACTIVE_VERSION = 'Y') ACTIVE_BPM_CASE ON sgw_bpm_case.CASE_ID = ACTIVE_BPM_CASE.CASE_ID) BPM_CASE LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT distinct d.resource_id, a.USER_ID FROM sgs_user a , sgs_user_roles b , sgs_resources d , sgs_security e WHERE a.user_serial_id = b.user_serial_id AND b.role_id = e.role_id AND e.resource_id = d.resource_id AND ((b.effective_start_DATE is null) or (b.effective_start_date <= UDF_GET_SYSTEM_DATE('Y'))) AND ((b.effective_end_DATE is null) or (b.effective_end_date >= UDF_GET_SYSTEM_DATE('Y'))) AND d.RESOURCE_TYPE_VALUE = 'BPM') RES ON RES.RESOURCE_ID = BPM_CASE.RESOURCE_ID where case_id >0 ORDER BY CASE_FILE, CASE_ID desc

query.sfwSql: SELECT * FROM SGW_BPM_CASE C WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE C.CASE_ID = (SELECT top 1 case_id FROM sgw_bpm_case WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE EFFECTIVE_DATE < = CONVERT(date, GETDATE()) AND [CASE_FILE] = C.[CASE_FILE] ORDER BY EFFECTIVE_DATE desc, case_id desc)
query.sfwOracle: SELECT * FROM SGW_BPM_CASE C WHERE C.CASE_ID = (SELECT case_id FROM sgw_bpm_case WHERE EFFECTIVE_DATE < = UDF_GET_SYSTEM_DATE('Y') AND CASE_FILE = C.CASE_FILE ORDER BY EFFECTIVE_DATE desc, case_id desc FETCH FIRST ROW ONLY)
query.sfwPostgre: SELECT * FROM SGW_BPM_CASE C WHERE C.CASE_ID = (SELECT case_id FROM sgw_bpm_case WHERE EFFECTIVE_DATE <= UDF_GET_SYSTEM_DATE('Y') AND CASE_FILE = C.CASE_FILE ORDER BY EFFECTIVE_DATE desc, case_id desc FETCH FIRST ROW ONLY)

query.sfwSql: SELECT TOP 1 CASE_ID, VERSION FROM SGW_BPM_CASE WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE CASE_FILE = @CASE_FILE ORDER BY VERSION DESC
query.sfwOracle: SELECT CASE_ID, VERSION FROM SGW_BPM_CASE WHERE CASE_FILE = @CASE_FILE ORDER BY VERSION DESC FETCH FIRST ROW ONLY
query.sfwPostgre: SELECT CASE_ID, VERSION FROM SGW_BPM_CASE WHERE CASE_FILE = @CASE_FILE ORDER BY VERSION DESC FETCH FIRST ROW ONLY

query.sfwSql: SELECT *, name + '(Ver.' + CONVERT(VARCHAR, VERSION) + ')' AS NameWithVersion FROM SGW_BPM_CASE WITH(NOLOCK) where STATUS_VALUE = 'ACTV'
query.sfwOracle: SELECT A.*, name ||'(Ver.' || CAST( VERSION AS VARCHAR(30)) || ')' AS NameWithVersion FROM SGW_BPM_CASE A where STATUS_VALUE = 'ACTV'
query.sfwPostgre: SELECT A.*, name ||'(Ver.' || CAST( VERSION AS VARCHAR(30)) || ')' AS NameWithVersion FROM SGW_BPM_CASE A where STATUS_VALUE = 'ACTV'

query.sfwSql: SELECT TOP 1 * FROM SGW_BPM_CASE WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE NAME = @NAME ORDER BY case_id desc
query.sfwOracle: SELECT A. * FROM SGW_BPM_CASE A --WHERE -- NAME = @NAME ORDER BY case_id desc FETCH FIRST ROW ONLY
query.sfwPostgre: SELECT A. * FROM SGW_BPM_CASE A --WHERE -- NAME = @NAME ORDER BY case_id desc FETCH FIRST ROW ONLY

query.sfwSql: SELECT top 1 CASE_ID FROM SGW_BPM_CASE WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE NAME = (SELECT NAME FROM SGW_BPM_CASE WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE CASE_ID = @CASE_ID) AND EFFECTIVE_DATE < = CONVERT(date, @Today) ORDER BY EFFECTIVE_DATE desc, case_id desc
query.sfwOracle: SELECT CASE_ID FROM SGW_BPM_CASE WHERE NAME = (SELECT NAME FROM SGW_BPM_CASE WHERE CASE_ID = @CASE_ID) AND EFFECTIVE_DATE < = @Today ORDER BY EFFECTIVE_DATE desc, case_id desc FETCH FIRST ROW ONLY
query.sfwPostgre: SELECT CASE_ID FROM SGW_BPM_CASE WHERE NAME = (SELECT NAME FROM SGW_BPM_CASE WHERE CASE_ID = @CASE_ID) AND EFFECTIVE_DATE <= @Today ORDER BY EFFECTIVE_DATE desc, case_id desc FETCH FIRST ROW ONLY

query.sfwSql: SELECT top 1 * FROM sgw_bpm_case WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE NAME = @NAME AND EFFECTIVE_DATE < = CONVERT(date, @Today) ORDER BY EFFECTIVE_DATE desc, case_id desc
query.sfwOracle: SELECT A.* FROM sgw_bpm_case A WHERE NAME = @NAME AND EFFECTIVE_DATE < = @today ORDER BY EFFECTIVE_DATE desc, case_id desc
query.sfwPostgre: SELECT A.* FROM sgw_bpm_case A WHERE NAME = @NAME AND EFFECTIVE_DATE <= @today ORDER BY EFFECTIVE_DATE desc, case_id desc
